messages.content: Dear neighbours, I don't consider myself to be a political person, but as someone who lives in Central Hove, I wanted to write to you to share why I'm backing Peter Kyle to be our next MP.

housing.content: Until fairly recently, I had been having real problems with my rented accommodation.

leaflet.personalStatement: Until fairly recently, I had been having real problems with my rented accommodation. After struggling to get these issues addressed, I got in touch with Peter, who took a real interest in my problem and was able to get me the help I needed. It was clear to me that Peter is someone who cares deeply about the local community and the issues we face, which is why I felt it was really important for me to share this with my neighbours. He is the kind of MP we need in Hove.

contactInformation.address: Unit A, Bishops Mews, Transport Way, Oxford, OX2 0NP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by Oxford Labour. Promoted by Melanie Davis on behalf of Peter Kyle both at 99 Church Rd. Hove, BN3 2BA
